name: Pure Harvest Organic Almond Milk
description: Almond milk is a delicious and healthy dairy milk alternative which is lactose free, gluten free, cholesterol free and has no added cane sugar. Unsweetened Organic Almond Milk is a full flavoured non-dairy milk made from real organic activated almonds with no added sweetener. Almond milk has been consumed by people as a part of their diet since the middle ages. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
